description: half length portrait of Frederick IV holding a sword upright in both hands; wearing soft cap with fur in front; fur trimmed jacket; in an oval with coats of arms in upper corners
inscription:
Signature, and Inscription

At top of sheet in black: FRIDERICUS IV BURGGRAVIUS NORINBERGIN / SIS: PARENS FRIDERICI PRIMI ET OMNIUM SE / quentium hujus familiae Electorum Branden- / burgensium  | in image on oval frame: PARENS FRIDERICI PRIMI ELECTORIS BRANDENBERGENSIS - FRIDERICUS IIII BURGRAVIUS NORINBERGENSIS | below image 4 lines Latin: Hic vir, ... nosce DEOS.  Benj. Ursinus / 3 lines in Latin about birth and death signed D.W. Just / B 2 QUOD | at bottom of sheet 6 lines handwritten in black | on sheet in pencil: 2-309
title: Frederick IV
